Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 cells transfected with wild-type or mutant SNCA constructs.

Readout description.Result Description: A53T mutation increased α-synuclein oligomerization by 40% compared to wild-type.
A30P mutation increased α-synuclein toxicity by 30% in HEK293 cells.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SNCA construct was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Unpaired t-test was used to compare mutant vs. wild-type groups.

Material used.Description: ELISA was performed to quantify extracellular α-synuclein levels in HEK293 cells.

Readout description.Result Description: A53T mutation increased extracellular α-synuclein secretion by 25% compared to wild-type.
A30P mutation increased extracellular α-synuclein secretion by 20% compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SNCA construct was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Unpaired t-test was used to compare mutant vs. wild-type groups.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Extracellular α-synuclein levels < 15% of wild-type control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Extracellular α-synuclein levels ≥ 25% of wild-type control.
